Articles.Content:
Hi guys I see a lot of excellent creations of Kerbal Space Program and always wanted to create my own show, so I converted my lets play of Kerbalinian Odyssey into a dramatized show but would like some idea's, well this is the best place to ask if you ask me.

The first episode is starts with me transitioning from a commentary to a dramatic show, the story goes that KSP was updated to 0.90 while a three Kerbal's were on their way to Duna and so the KSC is sold, the three Kerbal's carsh on Duna and are stranded, the Kerbal's on Kerbin have to start again building up the space program from scratch so they can send a rescue mission to Duna. Also there is a secret society calling themselves 'Keep Kerbals On Kerbin society' or K.O.K. for short they are trying to hinder the efforts of the Kerbalnaughts to get into space. 

The first video has been made and I am currently planning episode 2 which will be about getting Kerbal's into orbit, the start will be rockets exploding and a Kerbal comes up with the idea to use explosive decoupling to reduce weight to get a rocket into orbit.

If you want to check out episode 1 for what I have so far here it is: [http://youtu.be/gg4cRKt_Rvg](https://youtu.be/gg4cRKt_Rvg)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gg4cRKt_Rvg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

There is a button in the video to skip commentary to the show part of video if you want.

Let me know your ideas, they must have the brilliance of Kerbals while keeping their funny derpiness.

Cheers,

Mark.

Here is a list of the cast I have created (Names generated by game)

**Crashed and stranded on Duna**

**Bill** - Head of Tactical science team 

**Doodmon** - Scientist of Tactical science team 

**Ludwell** - Idiot of Tactical science team 

**Astronaut complex**

**Jeb** - Pilot and Kerbalnaught trainer

**Bob** - Well you know him as well

**Mission Control**

**Desdun** - Head traffic controller 

**Sidwise** - Assistant

**R+D**

**Sheldon** - Head scientist

**Archibald** - Assistant

**Administration building**

**Altrey** - KSC Administrator

**Design Engineering Rocket People or VAB**

**Mundorf** - Chief engineer

**Sidson** - Assistant
